title: Learning Satisfaction Design Workshop to Strengthen Leadership Competencies for Nursing Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing management theories and basic leadership principles
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive workshop conducted in a mobile-based microlearning environment for corporate nursing managers, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessment in a BYOD setting.

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning pathways using a constructivist approach.
Learners can develop learning satisfaction evaluation tools that reflect social contexts (self-development/organization/practical application).
Learners can implement the three stages of the learning journey (planning–execution–reflection) through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
